sql: CREATE TABLE `yana_device` (`id`  INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY  NOT NULL,`label`  VARCHAR(255)  NOT NULL,`icon`  VARCHAR(255)  NOT NULL,`display`  longtext  NOT NULL,`state`  TEXT  NOT NULL,`uid`  TEXT  NOT NULL,`values`  longtext  NOT NULL,`location`  TEXT  NOT NULL,`plugin`  VARCHAR(255)  NOT NULL,`actions`  longtext  NOT NULL,`type`  TEXT  NOT NULL);
ALTER TABLE {PREFIX}plugin_radioRelay ADD COLUMN state INT(11);
